MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL52 postcode area of Criccieth, affecting properties in Lon Felin and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:06am. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate the network and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:15am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:46am on 15th March 2021.
